institution-wrap.institution: Division of Intramural Research, National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases

funding-source.institution: National Science and Technology Development Agency Thailand
The Center of Excellence in Clinical Virology of Chulalongkorn University
Overseas Research Experience Scholarship for Graduate Students of Chulalongkorn University

funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by the following funding sources: The National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, National Institutes of Health, Centers of Excellence for Influenza Research and Surveillance (CEIRS) contract no. HHSN272201400006C to Richard J. Webby, the American Lebanese Syrian Associated Charities (ALSAC), The Research Chair Grant from the National Science and Technology Development Agency (P-15-50004) to Yong Poovorawan, and The Center of Excellence in Clinical Virology of Chulalongkorn University (GCE 59-009-30-005) to Yong Poovorawan. Nipaporn Tewawong received the Overseas Research Experience Scholarship for Graduate Students of Chulalongkorn University. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
